TextBody:
Hello Danylo,

I would recommend the users to use the option to exclude specific computers from the policy as in the below example:


This way the customers will be able to include all the computers from a department and ensure that if new computers will be added to the department, they will also be added to the policy. Also, they will have the possibility to exclude only specific computers/users where they want to allow the uploads.

Best regards,
Emil
ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CJb9s:ref
Subject: Excluding Computer also excludes all Department from CAP policy    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CJb9s:ref ]

TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CJb9s:ref

Hello,

Thank you for the recommendation, this feature works well.
But what if customer needs to disable one single PC from all available policies?
Is there some possible  way to make it, except manually change "exclude" under every policy?

I've tried to choose "Select all entries" and disable the PC in this way, but it did not work, the change did not implement to all available policies.


Best regards,

[cid:71ed5f77-fa10-4640-a48e-44fa2abde5c8]


Danylo Didenko

Security Support Engineer

CoreWin<https://corewin.ua/en/> | Contacts<https://corewin.ua/contacts/>

________________________________
From: Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com>
Sent: Wednesday, June 26, 2024 16:20
To: Danylo Didenko <danylo.d@corewin.ua>
Subject: Excluding Computer also excludes all Department from CAP policy [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CJb9s:ref ]

Hello Danylo,

I would recommend the users to use the option to exclude specific computers from the policy as in the below example:
[Image_2024-06-26_16-19-36.png]

This way the customers will be able to include all the computers from a department and ensure that if new computers will be added to the department, they will also be added to the policy. Also, they will have the possibility to exclude only specific computers/users where they want to allow the uploads.

Best regards,
Emil[https://nwxcorp.my.salesforce.com/servlet/servlet.ImageServer?oid=00D7000000091pB&esid=018Qk00000AyFRh&from=ext]

ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CJb9s:ref
Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #413067 - ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CJb9s:ref - Excluding Computer also excludes all Department from CAP policy    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0CJb9s:ref ]

TextBody:
Hello Danylo, 

This has to be done manually for each policy.
There is no possibility to include or exclude a computer/user from all the policies at once because each policy has it's own entities.

Best regards,
Emil
